function.name: arrayinsertat
function.help: Inserts a value at the specified position in the array. If the element is inserted before the end of the array, ColdFusion shifts the positions of all elements with a higher index to make room.

parameter.name: array
parameter.help: The array which will have the new element inserted.

parameter.name: position
parameter.help: The numerical index in the array where the new element will be inserted. Must be less than or equal to the length of the array. Remember ColdFusion arrays start at 1 not 0.
